name: You are our 1 billionth customer and have been chosen to take part in an exclusive survey!
name_original: You are our 1 billionth customer and have been chosen to take part in an exclusive survey!
description:
We here at the institute of Cardashian pride ourselves on our solid, scientifically sound social experiments that have never ever broken any Goneva conventions.

 Now we must warn you that with every survey you take there is a chance you may rage quit, have your data stolen, mouse changed to a tiny unicorn or experience a completely pleasant and care free time. We highly suspect it will be the last one; statistics have shown that nobody is really changing their mouse cursor to something fun and whimsical anymore. Plus rage games went out of style after flappy bird. 

h̷̢̛̖͇̰̓̽̽̍̾͊̌̌̆͊͑̀́̒̅̔̎̈́͋̇̎̇̿̈́͒͝a̶̢̧̨͚̮͉̫̣͔͙͎̲͕͕̗̺͓͖̝̻̱̳̖̻̙͉͈͒̀̀͘v̴̨̲͎̺̻̗̘̰̍͗̏̿̔e̴̢̖͗̋̇̏̈́̓̊́͗͊̒̈́̋͆̒͐̑̽͒͛̉̐̆͐͐̏̕ ̵̠͖̗̠͇̲͓̤̫̝͖̫̹̘̭̆̇͘͜͜f̴̧̛̠̰̝̥̘͖̭̈́͑̌͗̅́̋̑̄͒̊̈́̽̽̑̾́̅̍̆̌̍͊̚͠͝͠ư̷̝̞̮̞̰̣͈̣̳̗̝̰̗̣̦̤̱̗̇͌̿n̶̛̲͑̈́̋̉́̃̕͝͝
